english.segment1: Yoke me with Your presence. Lead me by Your spirit. Restrain my flesh from all contrary ways. Deliver me from evil. By Your power, Lord Jesus. You are the only One I want on the throne of my heart. For Your yoke is easy. And Your burden is light. Your law of Love frees me. And is my delight. Whatever it takes to be Yours. Lord, I welcome Your hand in my life. Yoke me with Your presence
